description: Variation of conditions 1 and 9 of planning permission dated 1st December 2022 (RN: 22/05952/FULL) for the 'Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 23 June 2015 (RN:15/01031/FULL) for erection of full height side (facing Malvern Road) and rear extension, demolition of existing mansard roof and mechanical plant and replacement with enlarged mansard roof extension at third floor level across extended building to provide additional hotel accommodation (Class C1), reducing to 3 dormers, proposed lift to all floors, small stone coping to the top of the parapet and details of the entrance door including canopy to hotel; relocation of bin storage facilities; Installation of louvre. NAMELY, to allow minor changes to the hotel entrance by way of a small open canopy structure.
